cmg.cnsim.engine.event

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmg.cnsim.engine.event.Event
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Event_ContainerArrival, Event_ContainerValidation, Event_NewTransactionArrival, Event_TransactionPropagation

    public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    The Event object for the event-driven simulator
    Author:
    Sotirios Liaskos for the Conceptual Modeling Group @ York University

        Retrieves the next unique event ID.

      • getTime

        public long getTime()
        Retrieves the time of the event.
        Returns:
        The simulation time of the event.

      • happen

        public void happen(Simulation sim)
        Executes the event in the simulation. Call node's periodic and time advancement reports.
        Parameters:
        sim - The simulation instance.

      • ignoreEvt

        public boolean ignoreEvt()
        Checks if the event should be ignored. Useful for when cancelling future events.
        Returns:
        true if the event should be ignored, false otherwise.

      • ignoreEvt

        public void ignoreEvt(boolean ignoreEvt)
        Sets the ignore status of the event.
        Parameters:
        ignoreEvt - true to ignore the event, false otherwise.

      • setTime

        public void setTime(long time)
        Sets the time value of the event.
        Parameters:
        time - The time value to set (time greater than 0).
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - if the provided time value is less than 0.
